1984-06-11.snippet: * Health magazine increasing its circulation rate base 5.3 percent, to one million, from 950,000, with the September issue.     * Working Woman magazine increasing its circulation rate base 10.2 percent, to 700,000, from 635,000, and its advertisi...
1984-06-11.lead_paragraph: * Health magazine increasing its circulation rate base 5.3 percent, to one million, from 950,000, with the September issue. * Working Woman magazine increasing its circulation rate base 10.2 percent, to 700,000, from 635,000, and its advertising 17 percent with the October issue.
